import React, { Component } from 'react' import { ColoredButtons } from '@/components/button/index' import './index.scss' class CampaignCard extends Component { render() { return (
SMS Campaign
Send personalised SMS to a segment of users which can be either broadcast or trigger in nature.
Create New Campaign
Push Notification
Send trigger or broadcast push notification to a user segment, and reach users on App and Web.
Create New Campaign
In-App Notification
Send highly contextual notifications to segmented users within the app to reduce drop-offs.
Create New Campaign
Email Campaign
Target users with use cases like personalised recommendations, newsletters, promotions.
Create New Campaign
) } } export default CampaignCard
